1.3. Version Log

Contents

  1. v1.0a1
  2. v1.0a2 (unreleased)

v1.0a1

First release, includes stand out classes:

  • CMConstant
  • CMDatabaseProtocol
  • CMDataModel
  • CMDecimal
  • CMError
  • CMFileCSV
  • CMFileICAL
  • CMFileVCF
  • CMForm
  • CMFormatter
  • CMHTML
  • CMMySQL
  • CMPostgreSQL
  • CMQueryProtocol
  • CMSLOC
  • CMTest
  • CMValidator
  • CMVersion

v1.0a2 (unreleased)

CMBox

  • 6671a10a6760f8cf4e65 Added CMBox class for drawing HTML container boxes.

CMColor

  • 7c6c485351d1e50dd18e Added CMColor class.

CMDatabaseProtocol

  • ef45465473002df8006d Added CMDatabaseProtocol::escapeEntity().
  • 7aa1a64d8f4c69b62a23 Fixed bug when not using CMConstant in some CMDatabaseProtocol::insert() situations.
  • ae2cd49422b4f41577ad Added CMDatabaseProtocol::describeTable(). Closes #96.
  • c84214053cce5213d80a loadSQLFile() is now standard. Closes #83.

CMDataModel

  • 5c0dc3440fc71fadc32e Minor bug fix for CMDataModel so now it uses escapeEntity() for recordExists().
  • 4a00e75295665d02ea78 All form objects generated from CMDataModel have default names now so you not required to provide any arguments to generate basic form objects.
  • 36d3ceca17a43230d025 Fixed bug in CMDataModel with 'pools' instead of 'pool'
  • 156409481a7db1eb5e15 CMDataModel::get() now has a third parameter that allows a default value to be returned if the pool variable doesn't exist and also supresses related error.
  • 5e8deadef0d85421e41b Added CMDataModel::setDefault() - set a variable if it does not exist.
  • 6edf328e59caa7949872 Fixed a bug in CMDataModel::extractNameValue() that would cause 'value' attribute to be always overridden on form buttons.

CMDecimal

  • da0cee008eb3e777868a CMDecimal should now work nativly with databases. Closes #65.

CMError

  • f6fde46ca810113280a6 The error messages that are printed from CMError are now much easier to read and more detailed.
  • 531dc73bcd90fa47deccd3bd07d5dc8505dc4728 Even better error reporting from CMError that is now HTML friendly.
  • 283fdcac7b69b78a5231580e15fbad027ede0c37 Proper error backtrace printing. Closes #95.

CMFont

  • 1b5eade87aae5c2e4ba5 Added CMFont and the ability to draw strings with that set font.

CMForm

  • 91ed5f2ffcbd0c6dd4b12302018c2a918a8eaa85 Added CMForm::FileBox(), CMForm::CatchUpload(), CMForm::SaveUploadFile(), CMForm::UploadFileExtension().

CMFormatter

  • 65e80e36df4fbc46c7b5 CMFormatter support HTML now. Closes #92.

CMGraphic

  • 640f894bbdb5d21780ea Added CMGraphic. Closes #85.
  • ab53cf5f544c46e54a18 Added static methods CMGraphic::ImageHeight() and CMGraphic::ImageWidth() for easier finding of file resolution.

CMGraphicDraw

  • 854e2aa7babf9f26c966 Added CMGraphicDraw class.

CMHTML

  • a4a535fb8ba9558ffae7 CMHTML::Table will now calculate and add in colspan's
  • d84443f4fe0a4f20eb1f Major changes to CMHTML::Table(). There has been a new manual page written on the new changes at manual_html_table.
  • 538580b98c6fe67f5533 Added the data replacer to CMHTML, it has been documented.

CMSerialize

  • b5f5d789b0c29073525ea4ccae087aba19a6ed50 Added CMSerialize for packing and unpacking arrays in JSON format. This is made to be partnered with the javascript module cmSerialize.

CMStyle

  • 58fa0a97f9917fb46522 Added CMStyle class for handling CSS styles in an object-orientated way.

CMStyleValidator

  • 17d6e10404c56d44eabc Added CMStyleValidator which is an abstract class for validating the member variables of CMStyle.

CMPostgreSQL

  • 8049c2381ce87f3021c7 Less warnings when connecting to postgres without all the options.
  • c992cd62bd871f41a67f Added CMPostgreSQL::loadSQLFile().
  • 90b0de008a3466a49ffa Added CMPostgreSQL::dropTable(). Added CMPostgreSQL::dropAllTables().
  • f76fa13556c1863dd594 Host parameter for CMPostgreSQL now defaults to '' rather than 'localhost'.
  • 70c1a20e2500ad558b28 CMPostgreSQL::castSafeType() is now array aware for type casting. Added CMPostgreSQL::Arrayify() to convert an array from the database into a PHP array. Arrayify() may become part of the database standard for all engines that support array data types, or even the use of strings as if they were stored database arrays.
  • 7a351726f973b9db0aebceb89fc0a532651ea916 CMPostgreSQL will treat empty int's as NULL values now.
  • 633d6f5daadcffd0990190dc321cfbb5e2de3922 Fixed bug with CMPostgreSQL::update().

JavaScript

  • ad229d099c6cc3532c14 New js/ui.js that allow smooth and instant dimming and undimming of the window.
  • 106092f0cfe05e85ca74 cmTableAddRow() now uses correct JSON parsing to apply tr and td attributes.
  • 610b3fe2e352657d820b1ed7336376b62380ea66 Added cmAjaxUploadFile().
  • 10a6133f20941da1ce1cf0572a9125ae5c3715b5 MAJOR: JavaScript for cmlib has been split into dynamically loadable modules. Use cmLoadModule() or cmLoadModules().
  • 79aa63302e8550d79549e3306b18b12a9ba9ff3f Added submitAjaxForm() and submitAjax().
Generated by  1.6.3
